2.caption_en: Slide summarizing key questions for designing Platform IT architecture, organized into five pillars: Operational excellence, Security, Reliability, Performance efficiency, and Cost optimization. Each pillar lists bullet questions to guide planning for operations, protection of data, scaling and availability, workload sizing, and cost-effective technology choices.
2.caption_ru: Slide summarizing key questions for designing Platform IT architecture, organized into five pillars: Operational excellence, Security, Reliability, Performance efficiency, and Cost optimization. Each pillar lists bullet questions to guide planning for operations, protection of data, scaling and availability, workload sizing, and cost-effective technology choices.

5.caption_en: Slide titled "Operational excellence" showing a gear icon and two bullet-point questions about managing operational changes to the Platform and anticipating and planning for operational failures.
